name: Paint-A-Piggy Kit
description:
Paint-A-Piggy Kit, is a cut little piggy bank kit that is perfect for a Easter gifts, or just a fun weekend project with your child/children.
Kids of all ages enjoy being crafty, and make something themselves.

 Kit includes:
1 ceremic piggy bank
1 Bag-o-Glitter
1 bag-o-sequins
1 bag-o-googly eyes
1 bag-o-pom poms
1 tube of glue
3 tubs of paint
3 paint brushes
1 craft stick(for spreading glue)

Dont want a Blue piggy?? Thats ok because they are available in pink,purple, blue and white and I now offer Kitty banks instead of piggys...(only in white)
Also available in girly or boyish paint colors!

Each kit will come cutely packaged in a clear

name: Lil Lovies
description:
Lil'Lovies are super cute chubby poseable cloth dolls,From head to toe they are approx 7inchs, they are string jointed, so there are NO small parts for kids to swallow. All features are handsewn. 
Dolls are available with any eye color and skin tones.
Dolls will arrive with a cute headband and real ultra premee diaper. 

ADD-ONS:
Magnetic pacifiers and thumb ....$10
Dress $10

(if you would like to add a add-on please contact me and I will set you up a listing.)

name: Little Diva Bracelets
description:
Little Diva Bracelets:
are very cute stretchy beaded bracelets that can be made in a rainbow of colors. They are very comfy to wear. My little diva loves her Jewelry and as soon as she seen these she was in love and wears them for hours. Can be made to match just about any outfit and can also be made with many different shaped and styles of beads..

Custom Orders are WELCOME!!

These bracelets are NOT meant for children under 3yrs of age as there are small parts that could become a choking hazard.
